text: Dahir Riyale Kahin (born 12 March 1952) is a Somaliland politician. He was President of Somaliland from 2002 to 2010. He was Vice President of Somaliland from 1997 to 2002.See: Somaliland Local Government Re‚Äêorganisation through Presidential Decrees in an Election Year, by Ibrahim Hashi Jama, Somalilandlaw.com, 7 April 2008. Accessed on 5 February 2015. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Presidents of Somaliland Category:Living people
title: Dahir Riyale Kahin
